Utilities toolbox

Functions

wrap_to_180(angle)

Wraps the given angle(s) to 180.

wrap_to_2pi(angle)

Wraps the given angle(s) to 2 pi.

wrap_to_360(angle)

Wraps the given angle(s) to 360.

wrap_to_pi(angle)

Wraps the given angle(s) to +/- pi.
